channel.title: [solved]
channel.description: hey guys im just wondering how i would make a normal altar be able to change my spellbook to lunars as i havent been able to find anything on google how to do this

item.title: [solved]
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

so this is my code

case 410: if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) { c.playerMagicBook = 2; c.setSidebarInterface(6, 430); c.sendMessage("Lunar Spells Activated."); c.getPA().resetAutocast(); } else { c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern c.playerMagicBook = 0; c.sendMessage("You feel a drain on your memory."); c.autocastId = -1; c.getPA().resetAutocast(); }

but its when i put the altar at my home, its a guthix altar…
and then when i click the altar it doesnt change it to lunar, it changes it to as if i was weilding a war hammer…

Read full topic

item.title: [solved]
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:3, topic:523231”][quote author=k1ng0frs link=topic=641783.msg4323308#msg4323308 date=1372487907]

case OBJECTID: //code } else { //blah break;
[/quote]

thanks dude
but for the code what would i put?
ive never done this so :[/quote]
I’ll give you a hint, check out your .java file where the spellbooks are located

(This is just a starter tip, perfect it on your own or you wont learn)

case ID: //Anim code //switchspellbook code Else { //anim code //switchspellbook Break;
Or use each spellbook switch on 1 altar
